name: Fate/Bloodborne
description:
This game is a fangame of FGO and Bloodborne.
Chasing Sabers in the universe, Mysterious Heroine X accidentally entered an Exotic God's dream.
When she was worrying about how to escape this dream, a familiar man appeared....
"Hunt is the only way to escape this horrible dream."
This game can be counted as a prelude of Mysterious Heroine XX.

(The English version of this game is still under development and may contain a number of translation mistakes and bugs.)

Author：Alan Zhang (遗忘的银灵)（https://space.bilibili.com/7252176/#/）
Author Website：www.cia7.com
Version：v1.62 Bilingual Version
（DLC1 estimated release date: Jan.1 2019）
（DLC2 restimated release date: 2019）
Supported Language: Chinese & English

Configuration Requiremnet---------------------------------------
Platform:
PC(64bit) ( MAC OS version will be available in the future)
Basic Requirement:
Intel Third Gen i3 CPU
4GB Memory
Intel HD4000 Graphics

Recommend:
Intel 7-th Gen i5 CPU
8GB Memory
GTX1050TI

Game Control-------------------------------
This game supports XBOX controller.
For PS4 controller user, please import this game into steam Application and use steam controller setting.
L/R Arrow Key Switch Weapons
Down Arrow Key Switch Items/ Toggle Options
Up Arrow  Get Blood Bullets
E  Talk/Interact
ENTER  Confirm
ESC  Enter The Menu
SHIFT  Sprint
TAB  Lock Enemy
（Z,X: switch lock target）
W,A,S,D  Move
Space  Dodge / Roll
R  Transform Weapon
C  Use The Blood Vial
Q  Use Item
Mouse Left  R-hand Weapon Weak Attack
Mouse Right  L-hand Weapon Attack / Defense / Extra Weapon Attack
Number1   R-hand Weapon Strong Attack/（Long Press）Charged Attack
Extra Info----------------------------------------------------
This game is only used for communication and learning. Please don't use it for any commerical use!
